org.hibernate.search.annotations

Annotation Type CharFilterDef


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={TYPE,FIELD,METHOD})
 @Documented
public @interface CharFilterDef
    Define a CharFilterFactory and its parameters
    Author:
    Gustavo Fernandes

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      Class<? extends CharFilterFactory> factory 

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String name 
      Parameter[] params 

    • Element Detail

      • factory

        public abstract Class<? extends CharFilterFactory> factory
        Returns:
        the TokenFilterFactory class which shall be instantiated.

      • name

        public abstract String name
        Returns:
        the name of this char filter definition. Optional when using an embedded Lucene instance, but should be provided to avoid conflicts when using a remote indexing service such as Elasticsearch.
        Default:
        ""

      • params

        public abstract Parameter[] params
        Returns:
        Optional parameters passed to the CharFilterFactory.
        Default:
        {}
